title: Prominent Harvard Professor Found Guilty of Lying About China Ties
sub_head: Nanoscientist Charles Lieber convicted on six counts related to payments from China
body:
A jury on Tuesday found Harvard professor Charles Lieber guilty on six counts related to payments he received from a Chinese government talent program, delivering a win for the U.S. government.
The closely watched trial has emerged as a key test of a Justice Department initiative meant to combat Beijingâ€™s efforts to mine U.S. universities to catapult China to the forefront of scientific development.
